GalleryContent.Body: Under settings, paths can now be defined so that nodes and packages automatically show up in the Library. You can even set paths to map to shared network folders for easy collaboration.
Presets allow you to keep track of different states of your graph by capturing the values of its input nodes.
Select groups of nodes and automatically generate the corresponding DesignScript code.

Search algorithms and keyboard navigation have been improved so that you can quickly search for nodes without using the Library. Right-click (or Shift + Double-click) over the canvas to bring up search. Hovering over search results reveals helpful tooltips.
Square arrays of color can now be applied to surfaces with the Display.BySurfaceColors node.

- Localization to twelve languages - Publish a package locally from Dynamo for Revit - Four new chapters have been added to the Dynamo Primer - New and updated Nuget packages for developers - New Command Line Interface for evaluating non-Revit Dynamo graphs.
